task.title: Configuring CMM support for roaming - phase 2 for MME
task.shortdesc: Step examples for configuring CMM support for roaming - phase 2 for MME.

step.info:
In the following examples:
UE’s IMSI PLMN: 461 02
AMF’s home PLMN: 460-02 (serving PLMN)
AMF’s shared PLMN: 460-10 (serving PLMN)

substep.cmd: Check and verify the configuration for handover from 5GS to EPS via N26 interface (source AMF).

stepxmp.p: check UePlmnServices (IMSI PLMN, New Serving PLMN) for n26IwkMme:
If the UE is moving from it’s own network, check UePlmnServices (old serving PLMN, new serving PLMN) n26IwkMme:
If the UE is moving from a different network:
check configuration for possible N26 restriction on target TAI for imsiRangeServices/ uePlmnServices (new serving PLMN, IMSI PLMN):

substep.cmd: Check and verify the configuration for handover from EPS to 5GS via N26 interface (target AMF).

stepxmp.p: check UePlmnServices (IMSI PLMN,Serving PLMN) for n26iwkMme:
If the UE is moving to it’s own 5G network, check UePlmnServices (target serving 5g PLMN,serving 4g PLMN) for interPlmnHandoverEpsTo5gs:
If the UE is moving to different 5G network, check UePlmnServices (target serving 5g PLMN,serving 4g PLMN) for interPlmnHandoverEpsTo5gs:

substep.cmd: Check and verify the configuration for 5GS to EPS idle mobility (context request from the MME to the AMF).

stepxmp.p: Check uePlmnServices {old serving 5g PLMN,new serving 4g PLMN} for interPlmn5gToEpsTau:

substep.cmd: Check and verify the configuration for EPS to 5GS idle mobility (context request from the AMF).

stepxmp.p: Check UePlmnServices (IMSI PLMN, old serving 4g PLMN) for n26IwkMme
Check UePlmnServices (target serving PLMN, old serving PLMN) for n26IwkMme.
If the UE is moving to its own 5G network, check UePlmnServices (target serving 5g PLMN,serving 4g PLMN) for interPlmnHandoverEpsTo5gs:
If the UE is moving to different 5G network, check UePlmnServices (target serving 5g PLMN,serving 4g PLMN) for interPlmnHandoverEpsTo5gs:

step.cmd: Configure MME N26 interworking restriction TAI list.

substep.cmd: Create TAI list for N26 interworking restriction.
Add TAI list to N26 interworking restriction TAI list.

stepxmp.codeblock: cmm imsiRangeServices modify --n26IwkMmeRestrictionTaiListName <string> cmm uePlmnServices modify --n26IwkMmeRestrictionTaiListName <string>
